Title: Titan Extreme EDP  -  100 ml(For Men)
Description: Created for the man of substance who overpowers himself and wins every game, this perfume surely boosts his self-confidence. This perfume comes with rich aromatic compounds like lemon, Madagascar vanilla, sandalwood and basil and leaves those around him spellbound with its exotic scent Oriental Fragrances Rejuvenating your senses, Titan Skinn Extreme EDP is an oriental fragrance that is masculine to the hilt and concocts a scent that is everything that a man looks for. Description: Private Affairs is led by the brands slogan as it separates the men from the boys, aiming at successful, elegant and serious men. Its composition is inspired by the smell of an expensive sports cars leather seats.

Title: Clinique Happy EDP  -  100 ml(For Women)
Description: Create an aura of mesmerizing fragrance with this sassy perfume, apply it daily and feel refreshed from within to face the world with confidence.

Title: Hermes Voyage EDT  -  100 ml(For Men, Women)
Description: Skirts swirl and shoes tap on the vinyl floor as the couple twirls out onto the pavement and into the sheer heat of the summer sun. Just like the aroma of light breeze that caresses their flushed cheeks, Hermes Voyage is reflective of all that they cherish of the summer - the ripe, luscious fruits, the bright colors and the long days spent making memories that will last them a lifetime. The luxury Eau de Toilette wraps them around in a cocoon of warmth and fragrance that sets the mood for those special memories for years to come. They dance away the blues with Voyage from Hermes. The French are known for their exquisite and delicate moulding of individual ingredients to an incandescent aura that is to die for. Voyage dHermes is no less; the fragrance starts off with fresh opening notes of amalfi lemon and cardamom. In the heart, subtle tea imparts its distinctive aroma and the dry down leaves behind faint notes of musk. Paris finest fragrance is bottled in a distinctive flacon with a metal flap in the front with a button-like adornment. The glass on the side reflects the beautiful fragrance within; spray on liquid charm and woo the world.

Title: Ajmal Chemystery EDP  -  90 ml(For Men)
Description: Revealing a mans powerful persona and adding a dash of panache to his day, Ajmalpresents this unconventional masculine fragrance that attracts the attention from everyone. Top Note Starting his day on a zesty note, this perfume radiates fresh and spicy fragrance of nutmeg, mandarin orange, grapefruit, basil and cardamom that will rejuvenate his senses. Heart Note A strong blend of style and sophistication, this perfume sets his pulse racing with its fresh and floral, crisp sensation of thyme, lavender and cypress. Base Note Spreading a soothing aura, Chemystery EDP has a base that is enriched with woody notes of sandalwood, tonka bean, vanillie, Virginia cedar and vetiver. This perfume flares up his carefree spirit.

Title: Issey Miyake L'Eau Bleue D'Issey Pour Homme EDT  -  75 ml(For Men)
Description: When everyone around him gets up to the sound of their alarm clocks, he wakes up to the melody of chirping birds. A sagacious optimist, he casually strolls through the park exuding an alluring mix of confidence, brio and Issey Miyake LEau Bleue Dissey Pour Homme. Created by Jacques Cavallier, this deep-scented Eau De Toilette is made for the enigmatic house of Issey Miyake. The first whiff captures your attention with zesty notes of lime along with sweet mandarin orange, the old-world charm of rosemary and pleasant hints of orangewood. Hypnotizing you into the heart note are the piney hints of cypress merged with sweet-spicy pink pepper, gin-like notes of juniper berries, light floral lavender spiced with aromatic ginger. Finishing off with a base note of rich sandalwood, smoky notes of amber, earthy patchouli, organic notes of oakmoss and warming hints of atlas cedar, this scent holds you captive. A warm infusion redolent with spice and tang, you can wear this fragrance any time of the day. Ensconced in a sleek rectangular bottle, this luxury perfume shines with an understated elegance. Immersed in a deep blue, this bottle radiates a subtle yet powerful aura. Creating a cool shroud, this perfume is the finishing touch to the ideal man.
